seo.description: Corporate Photo Booth Hire in Sydney & Melbourne for Events, Parties & Activations. Fully Branded, Shareable Content That Engages & Promotes Your Brand.

eyebrow: 360 Video Booth Hire in Sydney & Melbourne
intro: Capture Corporate Moments with Style and Impact. Engage, Entertain, and Elevate Your Brand with Sydney’s Leading 360 Photo Experience.
contentHtml:
360 Video Booth Hire in Sydney & Melbourne

Corporate Photo Booth Hire

Capture Corporate Moments with Style and Impact. Engage, Entertain, and Elevate Your Brand with Sydney’s Leading 360 Photo Experience.

Book Today

Capture Corporate Moments with Style & Impact

Planning a memorable corporate event in Sydney or Melbourne? Whether you’re aiming to boost brand awareness, engage employees, or launch a product, ONE360’s Corporate Photo Booth Hire in Sydney and Melbourne offers a professional, interactive, and fully branded solution designed for today’s content-driven world.

Our corporate photo booth hire in Sydney & Melbourne is designed to do more than entertain it creates content that extends your event’s reach across social media and online platforms. With branded overlays, instant digital sharing, and custom backdrops, your company gains valuable exposure during and after the event.

Book Our 360 Video Booth Today!

Planning a memorable corporate event in Sydney or Melbourne? Whether you’re aiming to boost brand awareness, engage employees, or launch a product, ONE360’s Corporate Photo Booth Hire in Sydney and Melbourne offers a professional, interactive, and fully branded solution designed for today’s content-driven world.

Book Our 360 Video Booth Today!

Our corporate photo booth hire in Sydney & Melbourne is designed to do more than entertain it creates content that extends your event’s reach across social media and online platforms. With branded overlays, instant digital sharing, and custom backdrops, your company gains valuable exposure during and after the event.

Photo Booth features you will Love.

Hire Our 360 Video Booth Today

At ONE360, we combine creative technology with seamless service to deliver a corporate photo booth hire experience in Sydney that is both professional and unforgettable. Every feature has been carefully designed to maximise guest engagement, brand visibility, and content value.

  • Ultra-HD 360 Video Booths
  • Professional Lighting & Glam Filters
  • Custom Backdrops or Green Screens
  • Social Media-Optimised Formats
  • Live Photo Gallery Access
  • Branded Printouts or Digital Keepsakes

Let’s Make Your Brand Unforgettable

Ready to add a show-stopping photo experience to your next event? Let’s bring your brand to life through content your audience will love.

Book 360 Photo Booth Today

Perfect for all
Corporate Events.

Hire 360 Photo Booth Today

No matter the scale or occasion, ONE360’s corporate photo booth hire in Sydney & Melbourne is the perfect addition to elevate your brand and enhance guest engagement. Our tailored setups are designed to suit all types of professional gatherings, creating memorable, shareable experiences that align with your business goals. Perfect for :

  • Product Launches
  • Shopping Centre Activations
  • Pop-Up Experiences
  • PR & Media Events
  • Trade Shows & Exhibitions
  • Festivals & Sponsorship Activations

Book Our 360 Photo Booth.

FAQs.

What is included in your corporate photo booth hire packages in Sydney?

Our corporate photo booth hire packages in Sydney are designed to provide a complete, end-to-end experience for your business event. Each package typically includes a modern photo booth setup (photo, GIF, or 360 video), high-resolution cameras, premium lighting, custom branded photo templates, a choice of backdrops or green screen, and real-time digital sharing via SMS, email, or QR code. You’ll also receive an on-site attendant to manage the booth, assist guests, and ensure smooth operation. We can tailor inclusions based on your event size, venue, and branding requirements.

Can we customise the photo booth with our company branding?

Yes, 100%. We specialise in fully branded photo booth experiences for corporate clients across Sydney. You can customise photo overlays, backdrops, booth touch screens, animated intros, printed templates, and digital galleries—all aligned with your brand colours, logo, and messaging. This ensures your corporate photo booth content is not only memorable but also reinforces your visual identity across all media platforms.

What types of corporate events do you cater to in Sydney and Melbourne?

ONE360 provides corporate photo booth hire services for a wide variety of business events in Sydney and Melbourne. This includes product launches, exhibitions, trade shows, marketing activations, networking functions, corporate Christmas parties, staff celebrations, conferences, seminars, gala dinners, and more. No matter the size or style of your event, we offer flexible packages that match the tone and objective of your brand occasion.

Do you offer 360 photo booth hire for corporate events?

Yes, we offer advanced 360-degree photo booth hire for corporate events in Sydney & Melbourne, perfect for creating immersive video content that captures the full energy of your event. Our 360 booths use a rotating arm to film guests from all angles in slow motion or real time, resulting in eye-catching branded videos that are ideal for sharing on LinkedIn, Instagram, and TikTok. These booths are particularly popular for product launches, media nights, and award shows.

How far in advance should we book your photo booth for our event?

To ensure availability and allow time for full branding customisation, we recommend booking your corporate photo booth at least 3 to 4 weeks in advance. However, we do accept last-minute bookings depending on schedule availability. For high-demand periods like end-of-year celebrations or industry conferences in Sydney and Melbourne, early booking is strongly advised to secure your preferred date and booth type.

Is there a limit on the number of photos or videos guests can take?

No, there is no limit during the hire period. Guests can enjoy unlimited photo and video sessions for the duration of your corporate event. This means all attendees can participate as many times as they’d like, helping boost engagement and ensuring a high volume of branded content is captured and shared throughout the event.

Can the booth collect guest data for marketing purposes?

Yes, ONE360 offers optional data capture features that can be integrated into the booth experience. Before receiving their photos or videos, guests can be prompted to enter their name, email address, or other details—making it ideal for lead generation at trade shows, conferences, and activations. The collected data is securely stored and can be exported after the event to support your marketing follow-up or CRM integration.

How do I book ONE360 for my event?

Booking your 360 video booth is easy! Simply visit our website or contact us directly to check availability and secure your date. Our team is ready to help you plan the ultimate 360° experience, whether you need 360 video booth hire in Sydney, Melbourne, or Brisbane. We’ll guide you through the process and answer any questions to ensure everything is perfect for your big day.
